item.title: Opening the Flow of Blessings
item.description: After a long Air Force career, Bruce taught kids at a Christian school. He and his wife discovered how to live in the flow of blessing, and they have never gone without. You can discover a life of abundance and impact too.
item.itunes:subtitle: After a long Air Force career, Bruce taught kids at a Christian school. He and his wife discovered how to live in the flow of blessing, and they have never gone without. You can discover a life of abundance and impact too.

item.title: He Has the Gift of Creating Wealth
item.description: He helped feed the world-and then dedicated his success to serving it. From pioneering global food innovation to investing in faith, education, and compassion, Howard Long's story proves success can fuel eternal impact.
item.itunes:subtitle: He helped feed the world-and then dedicated his success to serving it. From pioneering global food innovation to investing in faith, education, and compassion, Howard Long's story proves success can fuel eternal impact.

item.title: Are You Missing Out on a Great Adventure?
item.description: After bankruptcy and loss, they still chose generosity. They obeyed God's invitation to test Him. See the unbelievable moment when God honored their faith with a gift no one could have imagined.
item.itunes:subtitle: After bankruptcy and loss, they still chose generosity. They obeyed God's invitation to test Him. See the unbelievable moment when God honored their faith with a gift no one could have imagined.

item.title: How Their Income Grew 300%
item.description: They sold household items just to buy food-then chose to manage their finances God's way. That single decision unlocked a 300% income increase, meaningful ministry, and impact around the world. You can do it, too.
item.itunes:subtitle: They sold household items just to buy food-then chose to manage their finances God's way. That single decision unlocked a 300% income increase, meaningful ministry, and impact around the world. You can do it, too.

item.title: $80,000 in Debt-Paid Off in Two Years
item.description: She grew up in crushing poverty-and no one saw her potential. But she believed God had more. Watch how faith, obedience, and generosity broke a four-generation cycle-it can bring you freedom too.
item.itunes:subtitle: She grew up in crushing poverty-and no one saw her potential. But she believed God had more. Watch how faith, obedience, and generosity broke a four-generation cycle-it can bring you freedom too.

item.title: God Cares About Your Heart's Desire
item.description: In one of the most expensive housing markets in the country, the Josephs refused to give up their dream. By putting God first, they saw doors open that were closed to them. See what can happen when you trust God with your future.
item.itunes:subtitle: In one of the most expensive housing markets in the country, the Josephs refused to give up their dream. By putting God first, they saw doors open that were closed to them. See what can happen when you trust God with your future.

item.title: A Refuge in Life's Storms
item.description: When life overwhelmed her, Silver reached out to the same CBN prayer ministry she'd trusted since childhood-and someone answered. Today, she gives so others will never face their darkest moments alone.

item.title: Trading Crushing Debt for Financial Freedom
item.description: With just 95 cents left in her account, Donna made a choice that would shape the rest of her life. What followed was freedom from debt, steady provision, and peace-even in retirement.

item.title: There's a Better Way Than Chasing Money
item.description: While others chased upgrades and instant gratification, he chose obedience. That decision led to a thriving business and a six-figure year fueled by faith. This is what can happen when you put God first.

item.title: From Struggling to Survive-To Financial Peace
item.description: What if the key to peace and financial breakthrough wasn't more work-but more faith in God? See how a struggling single mom found abundance and joy by trusting God. Her story could change your life.
